title: Corporate S Font
content:
Hi Guys,

Thanks for reading this. Does anyone know of a free font that is very similar to the commercial font 'Corporate S'. I really appreciate all contributions.

Thanks, Ostorey :D
author: ostorey

comments.content:
Maybe Arial Narrow (if you already have it on your PC).  
Or, you can see if Liberation Sans or Deja Vu Sans (and Sans Condensed) fit your bill.  
That said, they surely don't offer the features and polishing of some commercial fonts.

\> Does anyone know of a free font that is very similar

This would not be legal, for the design of all three ASE typefaces was registered by Prof. Kurt Weidemann for a period of 25 years.

An excerpt from the patent office is shown here:

see [www.sanskritweb.net/temporary/CorporateASE.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130106073717/http:/www.sanskritweb.net/temporary/CorporateASE.jpg "www.sanskritweb.net/temporary/CorporateASE.jpg")

Sorry. I forgot to upload the file. Here it is:

[www.sanskritweb.net/temporary/CorporateASE.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130106073717/http:/www.sanskritweb.net/temporary/CorporateASE.jpg "www.sanskritweb.net/temporary/CorporateASE.jpg")
